o If the mother is at very high risk for complications of CD, it may be necessary to accept greater risk for
the baby in the interest of the mother’s safety.
• When in doubt, always discuss with a senior colleague.
CONTRA-INDICATIONS FOR INDUCTION OF DELIVERY AT A DISTRICT HOSPITAL 
• Breech presentation
• Fetal distress
• Previous caesarean section
• Parity ≥5
• HDP with severe features
• Large fetus (>4.5kg in non-d
